pitch.description: The angle the player will be launched at on the Y axis.

velocity.description: The speed the player will be launched at.

time.description: Time taken before restoring control to the player.

speed_max.description: Maximum speed required for full launch.

DrawDistance.description: How close the object needs to be to the player before spawning.

ObjName.description: The internal name of the object.

Extra.name: A board that launches the player if they have sufficient speed.
